task_text: [Public Health Policy][Comparative-Analysis] Compare peacekeeping-operation infection-prevention strategies with civilian-sector workplace policies in the WHO COVID-19 brief.

gold_end_state.summary: Peacekeeping strategies prioritize mission continuity with field-adapted PPE guidelines, cohorting, and evacuation contingencies, while civilian workplace policies focus on community transmission reduction, workplace mitigation measures, and legal/regulatory compliance; both require tailored risk assessments and operational protocols.

quiz.question: Which setting emphasizes cohorting and evacuation contingency planning?

arguments.text: Peacekeeping vs civilian workplace prevention strategies
